title: 🤩2 BED 2 BATH - NO FEE!!🤩 293 Herkimer
posting_body: ['No broker fee', 'September 1st move in date', 'Text Lihi @ 3477484234 w/ address 293 Herkimer', 'large and luxury 2 bedroom / 2 baths!', '- Welcome to Fulton Crossing!', 'A new luxury apartment complex located in Brooklyn’s beautiful Bedford-Stuyvesant.', 'An up-and-coming neighborhood in the heart of New York City’s most charming borough, it boasts tree-lined streets, stunning architecture, enchanting parks, and a diverse yet welcoming atmosphere – all within close proximity to the city’s bustling urban hubs.', 'This luxury Brooklyn apartment building offers large studio, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments in Bed-Stuy that feature unobstructed city views, spacious layouts, and state-of-the-art amenities.', 'If you’re searching for a Bedford-Stuyvesant apartment, Fulton Crossing is ready to welcome you home.', 'Building includes two elevators, a furnished rooftop with grills and amazing Manhattan views, gym, Lounge/Co-working area, kids play room, shared courtyard, laundry rooms and parking.', 'Great location half block away from Kingston & Throop C Local train and 2 blocks away from Nostrand Avenue A Express train.', 'A minute away from grocery stores and the bars/restaurants in Bed-Stuy and Crown Heights.', 'Apartment features modern open-concept designs.', 'Sleek finishes and modern hardware add an contemporary edge, while large French-paned windows perfectly frame beautiful views of Bed-Stuy and of natural light.', 'Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher, and extra space for table/island.', 'Spacious bathrooms, large closet, split AC units, hardwood floors throughout, and video intercom system!']
